title: 5.1 Master Challenge 1
question:
Create a presentation on Light comprising six slides defining light, reflection, types of reflection, refraction and differences between reflection and refraction. Add speaker notes for all the slides. Make different sections by naming them as under:
◼ Introduction
◼ Reflection
◼ Refraction

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
